mapper.sql: id, proId, proName, proType, planSDate, planEDate, proDeclare, joinId, proFilePath, createDate, proState, creater, proLogRecordId, proDevelopLogId, taskId, proProgress, createrSquadId
mapper.select: select COUNT (creater) from project_info where creater = #{creater}
select COUNT (id) from project_info WHERE proState = #{prostate}
select task.taskId,task.proId,task.taskName,task.eDate,task.handler,task.taskProgress from project_task task JOIN project_info info ON task.proId = info.id
select task.taskId,task.proId,task.taskName,task.eDate,task.handler,task.taskProgress from project_task task JOIN project_info info ON task.proId = info.id
select task.id,task.taskId,task.subtaskName,task.eDate,task.subtaskHandler,task.subtaskProgress from project_subtask task JOIN project_task info ON task.taskId = info.taskId
select task.id,task.taskId,task.subtaskName,task.eDate,task.subtaskHandler,task.subtaskProgress from project_subtask task JOIN project_task info ON task.taskId = info.taskId

update project_info
proId = #{proid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
proName = #{proname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
proType = #{protype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
planSDate = #{plansdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
